title: DDOS attack - What can I do
body:
Playing game. Game freezes. Restart PC and join game again. Enemy about to run down our nexus and it's apparent my whole team is only now reconnecting to the game also. Keep in mind game was even and no towers had fallen -> 2 mins and they're taking nexus. Everyone on my team is also saying ddos. Enemy team is pointing fingers and claiming they'd done it etc. I'm kinda in disbelief that ddos attacks are actually still happening. I thought they started and died during that kinda crisis like 3 or 4 years ago.

I'm posting here because I have no idea what to do after that. Can I get my series back? Can I help get the perpetrator banned? Is this game just a part of a larger ddos crisis going on? Is Riot actually working towards a fix or is this just an isolated incident?

Thanks for any info or help Rioters or more informed individuals might be able to provide.

Also, I'm just assuming this was a ddos attack because I'm not aware of anything else that could have caused such a specific attack.
